metadata.title: Keepline Unisex Flash Casual T Shirt Lightening 3D Printed Cool Crew Neck Parkour Tees
features: Material: Polyester.Without cracking,peeling or flaking,have good air permeability.The colors are vibrant and won't fade
Design:short sleeve,crew neck，Slim fit,stylish flash graphic,casual novelty 3D printed green t shirt.There are many different picturs about flash of lightening on the clothes

Occasions:Easy to match with your jeans,shirt or jacket on any occasions like Lightening theme costume party,dancing & rocking,homecoming,performance,show,daily wear and any events. It is also a decent choice as a present for team or group to performing on stage
Washing:Machine washable / handwash in cold water
After-sale Service:If you are not satisfied with it,please contact us via email first. We will response back within 24 hours.Wish you have a good shopping experience here.Thanks for your coming!
description: As different computers display colors differently, the color of the actual item may vary slightly from the above images, thanks for your understanding. If you have any questions, plese do not hesitate to contact us. We will answer your questions as soon as possible.
